channel.title: shiny on Albany R Users
channel.description: Recent content in shiny on Albany R Users

item.title: Intro to Shiny
item.description: Shiny is an R package designed to create web based applications using the R programming language. This talk will introduce the basic framework for creating interactive Shiny applications including user inputs, dynamic plots and tables, reactive programming, and creating data dashboards. Slides can be viewed here: https://r.bryer.org/shiny/Intro_to_Shiny/ Recording of the talk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W-DrXHqeqz8&t=5s
